    • Method Detail

      • BuyMutualFund

        public void BuyMutualFund​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method goes is used when the user wants to buy a mutual fund
        Parameters:
        input - the Scanner object is used for inputing the attributes of a new or existing mutual fund

      • BuyStock

        public void BuyStock​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method is used when the user wants to buy a new or existing stocks
        Parameters:
        input - the Scanner object is used for inputing the attributes of a new or existing stock

      • Buy

        public void Buy​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method is used when the user chooses the buy option. In this method they will choose what type of investment they want too buy. Based on there input the following buy method for stock or mutual fund will be called. If they enter the wrong input they will be reprompted
        Parameters:
        input - the Scanner object is used for getting input on the type of investment

      • sell

        public void sell​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method checks both arraylists for the symbol that is entered by the user. If the symbol is not found in either arraylist then the user will go back to the menu. If the symbol is found in the respective arraylist then call the proper method for either stock or mutual fund
        Parameters:
        input - used to get the user input for the symbol

      • sellStock

        public void sellStock​(java.util.Scanner input,
                      Stock stock)
        This method is used when the user wants to sell a stock. They could sell part of the stock or all of it. If they sell all of it, it will be deleted from the arraylist. Then the payment for the transaction is displayed and then and then the user returns back to the menu
        Parameters:
        input - used to get input from the user regarding the quantity and the price
        stock - used to access specific stock and its attributes

      • sellMutual

        public void sellMutual​(java.util.Scanner input,
                       MutualFund mutualFund)
        This method is used when the user wants to sell a mutual fund. They could sell part of the mutual or all of it. If they sell all of it, it will be deleted from the arraylist. Then the payment for the transaction is displayed and then and then the user returns back to the menu
        Parameters:
        input - used to get input for quantity and price from user
        mutualFund - used to access specific mutual fund and its attributes

      • update

        public void update​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method is used when the user wants to update all the prices of the investments
        Parameters:
        input - used for user input

      • getGain

        public void getGain​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method is used when the user wants to calculate there gain. It calculates the gain of the stocks and mutual funds individually and then adds them together for the total gain
        Parameters:
        input - used for user input

      • search

        public void search​(java.util.Scanner input)
        This method is used when the user chooses the search option in the menu. it asks the user for three fields the symbol, key words, and the price range. (This function is incomplete)
        Parameters:
        input - used for user input for 3 fields
